projects.title: PersonalGPT
projects.description: An open-source framework for creating personalized AI assistants that align with individual user values and preferences while maintaining safety constraints.

projects.title: Mental Model Toolkit
projects.description: A design toolkit for researchers and practitioners to understand and design better human-AI interaction patterns based on cognitive mental models.

projects.title: AI Reasoning Visualizer
projects.description: An interactive tool for visualizing and understanding AI reasoning processes, making complex model decisions more transparent to end users.

projects.title: Humane AI Guidelines
projects.description: A collaborative effort to establish design principles and guidelines for creating more humane AI systems that prioritize human agency and wellbeing.
